biotools.summary: AVATREE is an open-source computational modelling framework modelling Anatomically Valid Airway TREE conformations and provides capabilities for simulation of broncho-constriction apparent in obstructive pulmonary conditions. Additional functionalities of AVATREE include visualization of spatial probability maps for the airway generations projected on the CT imaging data, and visualization of the airway tree based on local structure properties.
